attributes.additional_details: I need you to put an end to tv license because off this
attributes.background:
How can the BBC justify paying a radio two DJ over £1.3 million a year and then have the fecking nerve to tell pensioners they have to pay for a TV licence.
Can this be shared please. I am furious.
I think its disgusting

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Privatise the BBC and make them self-funding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331189

Decriminalise BBC tv licence evasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549628
